transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan bolun.
Customer: Ji, Subir sir se baat ho sakti hai?
Executive: Baat toh hai.
Customer: Subir Sarkar sir Google se bol raha tha.
Executive: Kya bol rahe the?
Customer: Main India Mart se baat kar rahi hoon.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Fir se boliye samajh mein nahi aaya. Haan boliye.
Customer: Main India Mart se baat kar rahi hoon.
Executive: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Sir aapki taraf se ek mail aaya tha na.
Customer: Haan. India Mart ki leads ke regarding.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: To aap ek kaam kijiye na, suniye suniye na, mera jo dusra jo number hai na, aapke paas hai?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Us number pe call kijiye.
Executive: Wahi karte hai kya, 49 ka.
Customer: Haan haan haan, is number pe call kijiye. 82 jaise number start hota hai na, 8250.
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: Us number mein call kijiye.
Customer: Dekhiye ek dusra number hai.
Executive: Haan haan haan. Us number se call kijiye ek baar.
Executive: Is number pe thoda network ka issue hota hai, thik hai?
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sun rahi hoon, aap speaking with?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to talk to Subir Sarkar.

- Executive has network issues on current number.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to call on another number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, network issue, leads
